i don t like to eat meat.

participant_2.background:
I have no children, but I love my pets very much.
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.
i love to run fast.
i play video games all day.
I am a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you! How are you doing?
Not bad! I am looking forward to the weekend.
Me too! I am planning to go to the mountains with my friends.
That sounds fun! I love going to the mountains.
I do too! I love the fresh air and the beautiful scenery.
Me too! I also love going hiking and fishing.
I love hiking too! But I am not very good at fishing.
That's okay! I can teach you!
That would be great! I would love to learn how to fish.
Awesome! We can go fishing together sometime.
That would be great! I love spending time with friends.
Me too! I am looking forward to it.
